body.name: Ontel Pillow Pad Ultra Multi-Angle Soft Tablet Stand, Blue - Comfortable Angled Viewing for iPad, Tablets, Kindle, Smartphones, Books, Magazines, and More

features: Your New Favorite Accessory: Hands-free Pillow Pad features an updated and improved dual edge design. The ledges ensure comfort in differing angles - perfect to use as an iPad or tablet holder while standing, sitting in a chair, or lying in bed.

Bring Content Anywhere Comfortably: The convenient carrying handle makes it perfect to bring everywhere. Bring your tablet, e-reader, smartphone, or book to bed, your desk, or traveling! Stream or read without neck or hand strain.

Ultra-Soft, Sturdy, Lightweight, Travel-friendly and more: Our Pillow Pad features a built-in side pocket to store any important items like your phone or your ipad or tablet accessories like Air Pods, reading glasses, or a charger.

Crafted with Care: Our Pillow Pad is crafted from ultra-durable, light weight foam which creates stability for use as a stand or holder. The ultra-suede cover is removable and machine washable, perfect for use by kids or during travel.

Pillow Pad ships compressed and expands to full size after opening. Wrinkles are normal and should go away on their own. To help remove the wrinkles, place Pillow Pad in the dryer with a damp cloth on MEDIUM to HIGH heat for 10 minutes.
body.description: Are you tired of trying to hold up your device or book while sitting or lying down? As soon as you’re able to find a comfortable position and relax, it falls over! Introducing Pillow PadUltra, the multi-angle tablet soft stand! Easily prop up all your electronic devices and printed materials for the perfect viewing angle. Great for tablets, e-readers, smartphones, magazines, books and more! Pillow PadUltra provides three comfort angles to choose from. Simply rotate Pillow Padwhile lying down, sitting and standing to find the right angle for you. Pillow Pad Ultra's New Extra Large Pocket Allows you to fit your table for extra safety. Pillow PadUltra's built in ledge securely props up your device or book. Use Pillow Padfor reading, watching movies or TV shows, browsing the web, playing games, doing homework and more! Pillow PadUltra helps to relieve uncomfortable neck and hand strain. Pillow PadUltra is made of ultra-durable, light weight foam providing stability and comfort. The ultra-suede cover is removable and machine washable. Best of all, there is a built-in side pocket to hold your phone, glasses, charger, earphones and more. Keep all your important items within reach! The convenient carrying handle lets you take Pillow PadUltra with you anywhere! Great for traveling and long car rides. NOTE: Pillow Pad ships compressed and will expand to full size over time of being opened. QUICK TIP: Your Pillow Pad may have wrinkles after expanding. They will go away on their own over time. However, you can help remove the wrinkles by either using a fabric steamer, the steam setting on your iron, or placing Pillow Pad in the dryer with a damp cloth on MEDIUM to HIGH heat for 10 minutes. CLEANING: Pillow Pad can be spot cleaned, or the cover can be removed & machine washed cold.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Since 1994, we’ve been developing, marketing, and distributing some of the innovative consumer products. From popular toys, to home fitness equipment, to innovative household items, we love bringing new ideas into the world. Our products are sold with a simple mission: to serve people with products they want, and that make their lives more enjoyable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile Comfort with the Multi-Angle Soft Pillow for Tablets
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Multi-Angle Soft Pillow for tablets, and it has proven to be a game-changer in enhancing my digital experience.The pillow's soft yet supportive design allows for comfortable tablet use at various angles. Whether I'm lounging on the couch, lying in bed, or sitting at a desk, the adjustable angles provide versatility to suit different viewing preferences.The plush material not only cradles the tablet securely but also adds an extra layer of comfort. It's gentle on surfaces and makes prolonged use enjoyable without discomfort or strain.The size of the pillow is just right – large enough to hold a tablet securely, yet compact and lightweight for easy portability. It has become a convenient accessory for travel, offering a stable and comfortable base for my tablet anywhere I go.While the pillow primarily caters to tablet users, its adaptable design also makes it suitable for e-readers and even small laptops.In conclusion, the Multi-Angle Soft Pillow for tablets has exceeded my expectations. Its versatility, comfort, and portability make it a must-have accessory for anyone looking to optimize their tablet experience in various settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My hubby and daughter bought me this for Christmas and it was one of the best gifts I received! I love being able to just set this in my lap and prop my tablet up on it. So much easier than holding it because let’s face in our hands are going to get tired of holding a big huge tablet. Overlook the smudge marks. Tried to clean it off before I took a picture. Lightweight, super soft and even has a little pocket on the side that you could put earbuds or a little charger in. It has a zipper where you can unzip it and hand wash it if you spill anything on it. I would hand wash it and cold water and hang it to dry. 10/10 would recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as sturdy as I expected
reviews.reviewText: I had to wait a couple of days for it to plump up and it did, but not to the extent that I expected. It is still useful, which is why I gave it 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As described, but takes its time
reviews.reviewText: This product came in a vacuum sealed package. I’m not exaggerating when I say it took over a week, closer to two weeks before I felt like it had fully expanded. I was going to return it because after 48 hours it was still severely misshaped but things came up and I didn’t get around to it. Finally got back to do my return and it had fully expanded to the shape advertised. It’s been great since then.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hit or miss
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these. They gray one is just like Flippy and I'm happy with it. The blue one I purchased, however, was defective as it didn't inflate to the full size. It is actually missing an entire side of foam and there's a plastic bar inside.I did exchange the blue one and the replacement inflated but it's a different model than the gray version. This one is smaller, uses a softer foam , and one of the three sides isn't really usable.I'm disappointed. The original gray one I got was great. This other version is awful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When I first got the package and it was compressed, I thought oh no what did I buy.I took it out and read the directions, it plumped up within a half an hour.It is great for my Ipad, sitting or relaxing on the couch.Very sturdy and comfortable on my lap. Great price!

reviews.reviewerName: The Velvet Lounge Life on YouTube
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where have you been all of my life she said as she stared deeply into the plushiness.
reviews.reviewText: It doesn't take much to make me happy at this point apparently it's some weird pillowy thing and this is it. It is so convenient to hold up your phone, tablet, tap screen laptop or even as I have used it for my book. Much easier on your neck because you're not bending down as much and also better on your posture because you can sit up without bending over the electronics screens. It's one of my top 10 favorite things this past season.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I sent the first one back, I revived the replacement
reviews.reviewText: I received my pillow and removed it from the package. It never de-compressed, even after 8 hours - it was a pathetically limp pillow pad! I ordered a replacement and sent the first one back. The second one arrived and was the same situation. I really wanted this pillow pad so I wasn't giving up without trying something. So I lightly wet the cover and tossed the whole thing in the dryer. After about 15 minutes the pillow has plumped up to the shape it is supposed to be!
a friend had one ,I used it and look for it when I got back. Love it
This is exactly what I needed for my Kindle paperwhite. It fit perfectly while reading, bought it in blue. After a few hours, it smooth out completely.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great for my son's tablet.
reviews.reviewText: Forewarned it arrives in a small box all rolled up. When you cut it loose you expect it to spring up....ya that doesn't happen. Give it like 3hrs and then it goes to shape.Wanted something for my son to keep his tablet off his lap and this works perfectly. He loves using it and the carrying handle makes it easy for him to take it anywhere.
O produto veio apertado, numa caixa minúscula e não é perfeito como mostra a foto.

Llego roto, en una caja muy pequeña. El seguir las instrucciones para que regresará a la forma que debería de tener fue inútil porque el relleno venía roto y parecía incluso demasiado pequeño para la funda. Terminé devolviéndolo y comprando uno en otro lado similar.
